item.title: Emscripten-Forge
item.description: Emscripten-forge is a conda-forge channel which provides packages for the wasm / emscripten-32 platform.

item.title: OpenGM
item.description: OpenGM is a C++ template library for discrete factor graph models and distributive operations on these models. I used to work a lot on OpenGM when I was an undergrad bachelor student. Currently OpenGM in unmaintained. While OpenGM covers a state-of-the-art optimization and inference algorithms beyond message passing, the code is really really messy.

item.title: nifty
item.description:
Nifty is a C++ library for:

  • graph based image processing
  • multicut objective
  • lifted multicut objective
  • agglomerative clustering

I implemented nifty when I did my PhD since my research was focused on the topics above.
